title: New: James Blake – CMYK
body:
Over the past year or so, **James Blake** has quickly become a real head turner within the UK underground dubstep scene, with a series of impressive releases on fashionable labels, Brain Math, Hessle Audio and Hemlock.

The 22 year old music student will soon drop a new EP on influential label R&S. The title track **CMYK** manipulates warped R&B samples, synths and an complex array of keys, echoes and washes to create a truly original, melodic banger. Expect to hear this track being played a lot over the next few months.

The full EP will be released on R&S Records on May 31st.

[Listen to CMYK.](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tQoQirZwxE4)

[Myspace.](http://www.myspace.com/jamesblakeproduction)
